humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that 12 out of 13 lymph nodes contain metastatic tumor with prominent perinodal extension in 6 nodes. This corresponds to N2 based on the AJCC staging system, as N2 indicates metastases in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that 12 out of 13 lymph nodes in the left axillary contents contain metastatic tumor with prominent perinodal extension in 6 nodes. This indicates that the cancer has spread to the axillary lymph nodes, but has not reached the infraclavicular or internal mammary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage is N2.
